longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for the period of intended stay. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for nationals
of Azerbaijan (SEE NOTE 52764)
    NOTE 52764: The max. stay is granted within 6 months. 
Minors:
- Unaccompanied passengers under 18 years of age
   
- Minors born abroad to nationals of Macedonia (FYROM) and not
  holding a passport, must 
Additional Information:
- A valid visa in an expired passport
   
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
